metadata.title: CVE-2023-21840 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: PS). Supported versions that are affected are 5.7.40 and prior.Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker withnetwork access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized abilityto cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQLServer. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.9 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-21840` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.41-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-client - 5.7.41-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.41-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.41-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-common - 5.7.41-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-server - 5.7.41-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.41-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.41-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.41-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.41-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.41-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.41-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1').
mariadb-10.0 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
percona-server-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
